name: RunForest
description:
This is my little try at making a platformer.

This has 10 levels and 1 boss fight but this is my first time making a boss fight so its not that good but it will do.

You are a knight that lost his sword in the forest 
now he needs to explore te forest to find his sword so he can
defeat the the monster that has been terorizing the vilage
for decades.
